org.traincontrol.marklin

Class MarklinLocomotive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.traincontrol.base.Locomotive
      • org.traincontrol.marklin.MarklinLocomotive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, RemoteDevice<Locomotive,CS2Message>

    public class MarklinLocomotive
extends Locomotive
implements java.io.Serializable, RemoteDevice<Locomotive,CS2Message>
    Marklin locomotive that implements CS2 interfaces/protocols
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
